alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:25AM EST until December 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wintry mix including sleet and light freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulation of a tenth of an inch or less of ice on untreated surfaces. Little to no sleet accumulation. * WHERE...In Vermont, Windham County. In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield County. In Massachusetts, the Berkshires. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
